title: Didn't get my free chest that has ash and garen in it. bug?
body:
I made it to level five and got some chest that had a leona skin and some ward skin, but I didn't get a my free chest that was supposed to have Garen and ash.

Is this some bug, or was a limited time offer for new accounts?

I'm level 11 now and still haven't got it.

replies.body: Ahhh I believe you're referring to the premium chest! It looks like you're already level 11, so you should have gotten it by now. I've gone ahead and added that for ya, so be sure to check out your hextech inventory the next time you sign in ^_^!
Haven't received mine either, lvl 7 already :/
This same thing is happening to me... I hate to bother you but would you be able to help me out?
Having the same problem. Found this thread and wnated to ask, could I also get a fix please xD
Check out your hextech loot now!
I think Im having another problem, cant open the chest. Dont have a key but you dont need one, right?
You do actually need a key to open that one as well. Looks like that key didn't get added along with the chest this time -grumble- but it should be there now!
Thank you so much and sorry for taking up your time! You're awesome!
have the same problem.. i am lvl 17 already ..
Be on the lookout for it now ^_^!
I am having the same issue as well
Just started playing yesterday. Level 6 now. My friend says I was supposed to get Ashe but I only got the chest described above.
Having the same issue. I'm lvl 10 already and haven't gotten the chest.
Hello I have the same problem ,I didn't receive my ashe or garen champs
